values: 向；朝；往；到（某处）；达（某种状态）；对（某方向或某处）；面向；朝向；指向；（距整点）差…；（引出接受者）给；针对；与；关于；为了；用于；适应；比；比较；相对于；归属；属于；归于；附属于；（表示捆、系、拴等）连接；用作；成为；导致；直到；直至；至于；记入；在…之前；截止；接近；几乎；等于；每；一；伴随；为了给；以提供；适合；符合；致使；按…的看法；据…认为；变；转变；碰到；触到
向着；朝着；关闭；关着；关上；几乎；差不多；接近；靠近
（TO）编制表（table of organization）；电报局（telegraph office）；传统正字法（traditional orthography）；见后面（turn over）

word_group.brief_definition: 由…导致的；应归功于；应归咎于
时不时, 有时, 偶尔

bilingual.source: Turn to Page 87 to find out your result.
bilingual.target: 翻到第87页查看你的结果。
他一瘸一拐地走到门口。

bilingual.source: Maybe I'll also fly to other planets.
bilingual.target: 也许我还会飞到其他星球。

bilingual.source: Bring objects to the class (eg food items).
bilingual.target: 带物品到课堂上（例如食物）。

bilingual.source: Usually it takes an hour to get there by bus.
bilingual.target: 通常乘公交车到那里需要一个小时。

bilingual.source: We trek to native villages, for this is market day.
bilingual.target: 我们跋涉到本地村庄，因为今天是集市日。

bilingual.source: He was President of South Africa from 1994 to 1999.
bilingual.target: 他从1994年到1999年担任南非总统。

bilingual.source: The height of the track varies from eight to ten meters above ground.
bilingual.target: 轨道高度在地面上方八到十米之间变化。

bilingual.source: These words have been recently added to the Oxford English Dictionary.
bilingual.target: 这些词最近被添加到《牛津英语词典》中。

list.abstract: to是一个英文单词，可以用作连接词，介词等词性，英式读音“tə”、美式读音“tu、tə”，意思是向、往、给、于等。
《TO》是曾利文彦执导的一部动画作品，是一部这部以SF小说改编的全3D作品，

yingyinNormal.en: I was able to determine its location.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我查到地址了。

yingyinNormal.en: He then applies the strip to Dave's palm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后贴到戴夫的掌心。

yingyinNormal.en: You had no right coming down to my office, Ross.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你没有权利到我办公室来。

yingyinNormal.en: They deployed to Afghanistan and Iraq.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们被派遣到阿富汗和伊拉克。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't want to say. Is it really that high?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想回答。高到特别离谱吗？

yingyinNormal.en: What was it about Spock that appealed to you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 史波克史哪一点吸引到了你呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Chances of survival are dwindling to single digits now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 存活的机率下降到个位数了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm happy to carry it for you. You're scaring me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很乐意帮你拿。你吓到我了。

yingyinNormal.en: Dr. Ramoray, report to first floor Emergency stat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 雷莫瑞大夫，请到一楼急诊室。

yingyinNormal.en: When it gets to that point I'll kill you myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真到那个时候，我会亲手杀了你。

yingyinNormal.en: Salesman to interns backwards. No, it's not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从推销员倒退到实习生? 不，不是。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought you weren't supposed to notice things like that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以为你不会注意到这种细节呢。

yingyinNormal.en: But, he doubts you'd fight if it came to it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但他觉得真到紧要关头你未必会拼力一搏。

yingyinNormal.en: Sir, we were unable to acquire the droid on Jakku.
yingyinNormal.zh: 长官，我们没能在贾库星抓捕到那个机器人。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, math whiz, how long till we get to Australia?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，数学天才，要多久我们能到澳大利亚。

yingyinNormal.en: You're slipping. Middle-age, brother mine. Comes to us all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 退步了。人到中年啊，我的弟弟，你也会有这天的。

yingyinNormal.en: He was within my view from approximately 6:55 to 7:45.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他一直在我视线内，大概6:55到7:45之间都在。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Welcome. Hey. Welcome to Pandora. Good to have you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 欢迎，你好，欢迎来到潘多拉星。你来了真好，多谢。

yingyinNormal.en: I have to find Maggie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要找到Maggie。

yingyinNormal.en: And ushered us to safety.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把我们都带到安全的地方。

exam_freq_info.chinese: [引出接受者]给; 予; 向
[方向]向; 朝; 往; 到
属于; 附于; 归于

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: prep. 向；朝着；对；关于；为；有助于；用于（同TOWARDS）
prep. 向；朝着；对；关于；为；有助于；用于；接近达到；接近；将近

word_family.mean: prep. 向；朝；往；到；对；跟；与；属于；附于；归于；对于；关于；使；比；记入

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 由...导致的；应归功于；应归咎于
宁愿做；更喜欢做；更愿意做
复苏；使死而复生；赋予生命；使...活过来；使活泼
(向别人)证明自己是(某一类人)
达到...程度；...范围；到...的程度

examination_example.sentence: A long struggle will be needed <highlight>to</highlight> avoid a future of digital feudalism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了避免数字封建主义的未来，需要进行长期斗争。

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, this period of economic weakness may reinforce class divides, and decrease opportunities <highlight>to</highlight> cross them — especially for young people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，这一时期的经济疲软可能会加剧阶层分化，减少跨越阶层的机会——尤其是对年轻人而言。

examination_example.sentence: In South Africa, an HIV-prevention initiative known as LoveLife recruits young people <highlight>to</highlight> promote safe sex among their peers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在南非，一个名为“热爱生命”的艾滋病预防项目正在招募年轻人以便在他们的同龄人中推广安全性行为。

examination_example.sentence: Mayor Jose Luis Martinez-Almeida made opposition <highlight>to</highlight> the zone a centerpiece of his election campaign, despite its success in improving air quality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Jose Luis Martinez-Almeida市长把反对这个区作为他选举运动的核心，尽管它的确提升了空气质量。

examination_example.sentence: As the cost <highlight>to</highlight> everyone else has become clearer, politicians have begun <highlight>to</highlight> clamp down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于带给所有人的损失已变得日益明显，政客们开始采取强硬手段。

examination_example.sentence: Similar <highlight>to</highlight> newly staked mining claims, they are full of potential.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与新提出的采矿主张类似，它们也充满了潜力。

examination_example.sentence: Humility requires you <highlight>to</highlight> recognize weakness in your own arguments and sometimes also <highlight>to</highlight> accept reasons on the opposite side.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谦逊要求你认识到自己论点中的弱点，有时也要接受相反的理由。

examination_example.sentence: If you have no friends or relatives, try <highlight>to</highlight> participate in several online communities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你没有朋友或亲戚，试着参加几个在线社区。

examination_example.sentence: Arizona had attempted <highlight>to</highlight> fashion state policies that ran parallel <highlight>to</highlight> the existing federal ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚利桑那州曾试图制定与现有联邦政策平行的州政策。

sense_info_list.zh: [引出接受者]给; 予; 向

examination_example.sentence: Cooper and her colleagues argue that the success of the crown for Hull ought not <highlight>to</highlight> be confined <highlight>to</highlight> cities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Cooper和她的同事们认为，Hull赢得这一荣耀后的成功不应局限于城市。

examination_example.sentence: The bans, if fully enforced, would suggest <highlight>to</highlight> women (and many men) that they should not let others be arbiters of their beauty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些禁令如果得到全面实施，将会提醒女性(以及许多男性)，他们不应该让别人成为自身美丽的仲裁者。

examination_example.sentence: pose a threat <highlight>to</highlight> all its peers
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对所有同行构成威胁

examination_example.sentence: "They're harder <highlight>to</highlight> find and they have job offers," says Jay Dunwell, president of Wolverine Coil Spring, a family-owned firm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “他们（工人）更难找到，而且他们有工作机会，”家族企业 Wolverine Coil Spring 的总裁 Jay Dunwell 说。

examination_example.sentence: For women who stay home, they never get <highlight>to</highlight> leave the office.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于呆在家里的女性来说，她们从来没能离开“办公室”。

examination_example.sentence: Our immediate future is hard <highlight>to</highlight> conceive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们眼前的未来很难想象。

examination_example.sentence: Organic eggs went from being dismissed as a niche product in natural foods stores <highlight>to</highlight> being sold at Walmart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有机鸡蛋从在天然食品商店被视为小众产品，变成在沃尔玛热销。

examination_example.sentence: For these reasons, I stopped weighing myself every day and switched <highlight>to</highlight> a bimonthly weighing schedule instead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于这些原因，我不再每天给自己称重，而是改为每两个月称重一次。

examination_example.sentence: The move turned out <highlight>to</highlight> be foresighted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，这一举动是有远见的。

examination_example.sentence: The author considers it a good sign that employers are taking a realistic attitude <highlight>to</highlight> degrees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者认为，雇主正在采取现实的态度对待学位是一个好迹象。

examination_example.sentence: These range from around £500 <highlight>to</highlight> $5,000, and apparently the work gets more expensive the more that publishers do it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些作品的价格从500美元到5000美元不等，显然作品越贵出版商做得越多。

examination_example.sentence: The interviewers had rated applicants on a scale of one <highlight>to</highlight> five.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面试官对申请人的评分从一到五不等。

sense_info_list.zh: [方向]向; 朝; 往; 到

examination_example.sentence: Trash litter the planet, from Mount Everest <highlight>to</highlight> the Mariana Trench, because plastics are everywhere and don't break down easily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从珠穆朗玛峰到马里亚纳海沟，垃圾遍布全球，因为塑料无处不在，而且不容易分解。

examination_example.sentence: For wild animals that cannot be returned <highlight>to</highlight> their natural habitats, zoos offer the best alternative.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于无法返回自然栖息地的野生动物，动物园提供了最好的选择。

examination_example.sentence: If we adults could indulge in a bit of silliness and giggling, we would improve blood flow <highlight>to</highlight> our hearts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们成年人可以沉溺于一点愚蠢和傻笑，就能改善我们心脏的血液流动。

examination_example.sentence: There'll probably have <highlight>to</highlight> be less socializing with your friends and less time with your family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能不得不减少和朋友的社交，减少和家人在一起的时间。

examination_example.sentence: And today, even writers who are fairly well-known often have <highlight>to</highlight> do other work <highlight>to</highlight> supplement their writing income.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，即使是相当有名气的作家，也经常要做其他工作来贴补写作收入。

examination_example.sentence: Beyond this, major CEOs still have <highlight>to</highlight> do all the day-<highlight>to</highlight>-day work they have always done.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除此之外，主要的首席执行官们仍必须做他们一直以来都在做的所有日常工作。

sense_info_list.zh: 属于; 附于; 归于

examination_example.sentence: Retirement patterns are changing partly due <highlight>to</highlight> longer life expectancy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 退休模式正在发生变化，部分原因是预期寿命延长。

examination_example.sentence: This generation, due <highlight>to</highlight> the pressures of technology, will work for 17 different employers over the course of their working life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于技术的压力，这一代人将在他们的职业生涯中为17个不同的雇主工作。

examination_example.sentence: Facebook promised the European commission then that it would not link phone numbers <highlight>to</highlight> Facebook identities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 脸书当时向欧盟委员会承诺，不会将电话号码与脸书身份联系起来。

examination_example.sentence: Generally however British land artists preferred <highlight>to</highlight> get away from towns, gravitating towards landscapes that are traditionally considered beautiful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，一般来说，英国大地艺术家更喜欢远离城镇，被传统意义上认为美丽的风景所吸引。

examination_example.sentence: Six in 10 "unretirees" are increasing their savings in anticipation of a longer life, according <highlight>to</highlight> the survey.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据调查显示，每十个“未退休者”中就有六个正在增加他们的储蓄，以期待更长的寿命。

examination_example.sentence: According <highlight>to</highlight> the last paragraph, a key <highlight>to</highlight> coping with dark patterns is businesses' self-discipline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据最后一段，应对黑暗模式的关键是企业的自律。

examination_example.sentence: According <highlight>to</highlight> Paragraph 1, museums are faced with difficulties in maintaining their plastic items.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据第一段，博物馆在维护其塑料物品方面面临困难。

examination_example.sentence: It might mean spending less time watching television or listening <highlight>to</highlight> music, though some people can write while they listen <highlight>to</highlight> music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能意味着花更少的时间看电视或听音乐，尽管有些人可以一边听音乐一边写作。

examination_example.sentence: Listen <highlight>to</highlight> customer feedback.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 倾听客户的反馈。

examination_example.sentence: Listen <highlight>to</highlight> your body.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 倾听你的身体。

examination_example.sentence: Time is finite, the older you get, the quicker it seems <highlight>to</highlight> go.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时间是有限的，人越老，时间似乎过得越快。

examination_example.sentence: Some artists seem <highlight>to</highlight> worry about in the art-science partnership their role may be underestimated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些艺术家似乎担心在艺术与科学的伙伴关系中，他们的作用可能被低估。

examination_example.sentence: These were some of the words that Nature readers used <highlight>to</highlight> describe their experience of art-science collaborations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是《自然》杂志的读者用来描述他们的艺术与科学合作经历的一些词汇。

examination_example.sentence: You have the importation of terminology that historically used <highlight>to</highlight> be associated with non-profit organizations and religious organizations: terms like vision, values, passion, and purpose
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以看到历史上与非营利组织和宗教组织联系在一起的术语的引入:像愿景、价值观、激情和目标这样的术语

examination_example.sentence: We suddenly can't remember the name of an old band we used <highlight>to</highlight> love.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们会突然记不起曾经喜欢的一个老乐队的名字。

examination_example.sentence: Millions of Americans and foreigners see G.I. Joe as a mindless war toy, the symbol of American military adventurism, but that's not how it used <highlight>to</highlight> be.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数以百万计的美国人和外国人把《特种部队》视为一个无脑的战争玩具，美国军事冒险主义的象征，但过去并非如此。

examination_example.sentence: The signaling in a plant is only superficially similar <highlight>to</highlight> the firing in a complex animal brain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 植物发出的信号与复杂动物大脑发出的信号只有表面上的相似。

examination_example.sentence: Zoos are in that sense similar <highlight>to</highlight> natural history and archeology museums serving <highlight>to</highlight> satisfy our need for contact with these living creatures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从这个意义上说，动物园类似于自然历史和考古博物馆，是为了满足我们与这些生物接触的需要。

examination_example.sentence: Some aspects of plant behavior could be compared <highlight>to</highlight> intelligence in animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 植物行为的某些方面可以与动物的智力相比较。

examination_example.sentence: What you start out trying <highlight>to</highlight> achieve may not come <highlight>to</highlight> life the way that you expected.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你一开始想要达到的目标可能不会以你期望的方式实现。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 据…认为; 伴随; 随同
关于; 归于; 对于

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 可引起；导致；使发生(或存在)
指的是；查阅；参考；谈到；涉及
(承认属实)诚然；固然；无可否认
曾经是；可以用来；要用作
上诉；呼吁；对...有吸引力；利用...
宁愿做；更喜欢做；更愿意做
买得起；负担得起；承担得起
与…相反；与…背道而驰；违反
关注；处理；服务；接待；关心；照料
总之；总而言之；综上所述
延续；超出正常(或原来)应用范围
易接近的；可归属的；可得到的
遵守；履行；不离开；留在；切题

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: prep. 向；朝着；对；关于；为；有助于；用于（同TOWARDS）
prep. 向；朝着；对；关于；为；有助于；用于；接近达到；接近；将近

word_family.mean: prep. 向；朝；往；到；对；跟；与；属于；附于；归于；对于；关于；使；比；记入

examination_example.sentence: But my mother did everything she could <highlight>to</highlight> help me feel happy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我母亲尽了她所能让我感到幸福。

examination_example.sentence: A history book which may contain the facts in story form will be easier <highlight>to</highlight> read than one dealing with scientific subjects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一本可能以故事形式包含事实的历史书比一本涉及科学主题的书更容易阅读。

examination_example.sentence: This will help you <highlight>to</highlight> decide whether you really need <highlight>to</highlight> read the whole book or only certain parts of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这将帮助你决定你是否真的需要阅读整本书，还是只阅读其中的某些部分。

examination_example.sentence: Let's get back <highlight>to</highlight> the car.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们回到车上吧。

examination_example.sentence: The hungry bear followed his nose <highlight>to</highlight> our camp, which was surrounded by a high wire fence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这只饥饿的熊循着鼻子来到我们的营地，那里被高高的铁丝网包围着。

examination_example.sentence: Welcome <highlight>to</highlight> Holker Hall & Gardens
examination_example.sentence_trans: 欢迎来到Holker大厅和花园

examination_example.sentence: According <highlight>to</highlight> this passage, what is arguing?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据这篇文章，争论的是什么？

examination_example.sentence: According <highlight>to</highlight> a recent study, both the size and consumption habits of our eating companions can influence our food intake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据最近的一项研究，我们的饮食伙伴的体型和食用习惯都会影响我们的食物摄入量。

examination_example.sentence: According <highlight>to</highlight> recent studies, the answer is a big YES, if the air quality in your camping area is good.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据最近的研究，答案是肯定的，如果你露营的地方空气质量好的话。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>To</highlight> ensure their survival.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了确保他们的生存。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>To</highlight> improve telecommunications services
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了改善电讯服务

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>To</highlight> call for the modernization of public library systems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了呼吁公共图书馆系统现代化。

examination_example.sentence: I've got <highlight>to</highlight> finish reading the yearly financial report by 10.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我必须在十点以前看完年度财务报告。

examination_example.sentence: This means that resolving an argument can feel like you have reached a state of resolution—and you are less likely <highlight>to</highlight> be annoyed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着解决争吵会让你感觉自己已经达到了解决的状态——而且你不太可能生气。

examination_example.sentence: You may not like them, but at least you don't have <highlight>to</highlight> write her a thank-you note.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能不喜欢它们，但至少你不必给她写感谢信。

examination_example.sentence: Data shows that kids and teens who do read frequently, compared <highlight>to</highlight> infrequent readers, have more books in the home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数据显示，比起很少阅读的孩子，经常阅读的孩子和青少年家里有更多的书。

examination_example.sentence: They hoped that wolves would be able <highlight>to</highlight> control the elk and coyote problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们希望狼能够控制麋鹿和土狼的问题。

examination_example.sentence: Still others may simply enjoy being outdoors and close <highlight>to</highlight> plants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有一些人可能只是喜欢待在户外，靠近植物。

sense_info_list.zh: 据…认为; 伴随; 随同
关于; 归于; 对于

word_usage.usage:
作不定式符号，与动词原形连用，构成动词不定式结构，在句子中可作除谓语以外的成分
（1）作主语：It wasn't easy to win the match. = To win the match wasn't easy. 赢这场比赛不容易。
（2）作宾语：I want to put these things in the car. 我想把这些东西放进车里。（下列动词后也用动词不定式作宾语：decide、hope、begin、start、expect、promise、refuse、want、wish等。）
（3）作表语：His wish is to become a pilot. 他的愿望是当飞行员。
（4）作定语：I have something important to tell you. 我有重要的事情要告诉你。

（5）作宾语补足语：I told you not to tell it to others. 我告诉你不要把这件事情告诉别人。
a.下列动词后常接不定式作宾补：allow、ask、advise、beg、cause、drive（强迫）、encourage、expect、forbid、force、get、 would like （love、hate）、order、permit、persuade、teach、tell、want、warn、wish等。
b.部分动词后常接to be+形容词、名词短语等形式，有时to be可以省略，如：believe、consider、discover、find（= consider）、feel（= think）、imagine、judge、know、prove、think、suppose、see（= understand）等。
c.不定式在感官动词（see、hear、feel、listen to、look at、find、watch等）、使役动词（let、make、have等）的后面作宾补时，不带to，但在被动语态中要还原to。
（6）作状语：It is never too old to learn. 活到老，学到老。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 用于动词原形前构成不定式
向; 朝; 往; 到(某处)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

prep. 向；朝着；对；关于；为；有助于；用于；接近达到；接近；将近

word_family.mean: prep. 向；朝；往；到；对；跟；与；属于；附于；归于；对于；关于；使；比；记入

sense_info_list.zh: 用于动词原形前构成不定式

examination_example.sentence: The short Chinese man seems <highlight>to</highlight> be the tallest in the world right now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个矮小的中国人此刻似乎是世界上最高的人。

examination_example.sentence: He asked some soldiers <highlight>to</highlight> lead the elephant onto a boat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他让一些士兵把大象带到一艘船上。

examination_example.sentence: You will be able <highlight>to</highlight> do more．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你将能做得更多。

examination_example.sentence: Recently, an Italian grandma made a video <highlight>to</highlight> help everyone fight the disease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近，一位意大利奶奶制作了一段视频，来帮助大家对抗疾病。

examination_example.sentence: People choose unsuitable places <highlight>to</highlight> set the box.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们选择不合适的地方来摆放盒子。

examination_example.sentence: Wolves are dangerous and should be killed in order <highlight>to</highlight> protect other animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 狼很危险，为了保护其他动物，应该杀死它们。

examination_example.sentence: It s unfair <highlight>to</highlight> the animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对动物不公平。

examination_example.sentence: She talks <highlight>to</highlight> everybody, even people who she doesn't know.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她和每个人说话，甚至是她不认识的人。

examination_example.sentence: After that day,for 364 days,I was looking forward <highlight>to</highlight> the next Mother's Day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那天之后的364天，我都在期待下一个母亲节。

sense_info_list.zh: 向; 朝; 往; 到(某处)

examination_example.sentence: They tend <highlight>to</highlight> go back <highlight>to</highlight> bed on their own and won't remember it in the morning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们往往会自己回到床上，然后早上就不记得了。

examination_example.sentence: I was always allowed <highlight>to</highlight> pick a penny candy when I came <highlight>to</highlight> the store with Grandma.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我和奶奶来到商店时，我总是可以买一分钱的糖果。

examination_example.sentence: Students have to get <highlight>to</highlight> the school at 1: 55.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生必须在1: 55到达学校。

examination_example.sentence: We have <highlight>to</highlight> remember <highlight>to</highlight> "feed the parrots" in our lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们必须记得去喂那些生活中的“鹦鹉”。

examination_example.sentence: If you have <highlight>to</highlight> go <highlight>to</highlight> unsafe places, go with someone you know or speak <highlight>to</highlight> someone over the phone while you are there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你非得去不安全的地方，那就和你认识的人一起去，或者在那里的时候通过电话跟人保持联系。

examination_example.sentence: Students have <highlight>to</highlight> get to the school at 1: 55.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生必须在1: 55到达学校。

examination_example.sentence: What's the common advantage of regular school according <highlight>to</highlight> the students?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据学生的情况，正规学校的共同优势是什么？

examination_example.sentence: According <highlight>to</highlight> the report, activity standards are different in different countries and they are also different between boys and girls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据报告，不同国家的活动标准是不一样的，并且男孩和女孩的活动标准也不一样。

examination_example.sentence: Which of the following is TRUE according <highlight>to</highlight> the passage?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据文章，下列哪一项是正确的？

examination_example.sentence: When I picked up my son from preschool one recent summer afternoon, he looked dirty from head <highlight>to</highlight> foot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近一个夏天的下午，当我去幼儿园接儿子时，他从头到脚看起来都很脏。

examination_example.sentence: The students do the "ghost shuffle" routine for 2.5 hours every week from Monday <highlight>to</highlight> Friday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生们从周一到周五每周做2.5个小时的“幽灵洗牌”。

examination_example.sentence: The rainy season usually takes place from June <highlight>to</highlight> September in my hometown.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我的家乡，雨季通常发生在六月到九月。

examination_example.sentence: The guests usually give the red packets <highlight>to</highlight> the attendants and sign their names on a long piece of paper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 客人们通常把红包给服务员，并在一张长纸上签上他们的名字。

examination_example.sentence: Chang'e refused <highlight>to</highlight> give it <highlight>to</highlight> him and took it all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 嫦娥不肯交给他，拿走了全部。

examination_example.sentence: It can offer living places and food <highlight>to</highlight> five or six writers at a time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以一次给五六个作家提供住处和食物。

examination_example.sentence: How are we ever going <highlight>to</highlight> win anything at the Inter-School Athletics without proper training?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果没有适当的训练，我们将如何在校际田径赛中获胜？

examination_example.sentence: It's difficult for humans <highlight>to</highlight> raise money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类很难筹集到资金。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>To</highlight> our disappointment, we found that it was closed for the whole time of our stay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 令我们失望的是，我们发现它在我们逗留的整个时间里都是关闭的。

word_usage.usage:
表示时间“几点差几分”可以用介词to。
 示例：10点50分（可以说11点差10分）
ten to eleven
